mapper.sql: id, account_id, checker, product_id, create_time, update_time, enable
mapper.insert: insert into carsok_dailycheck_Dispatcher (id, account_id, checker, product_id, create_time, update_time, enable) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(),1)

insert into carsok_dailycheck_Dispatcher
id,
account_id,
checker,
product_id,

enable,

mapper.update:
update carsok_dailycheck_Dispatcher
account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checker = #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update carsok_dailycheck_Dispatcher set account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checker = #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = now(), enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT(checker) from carsok_dailycheck_dispatcher where enable=1 and account_id=#{accountId} AND DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d')= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
select * from carsok_dailycheck_dispatcher where enable=1 and account_id=#{accountId}
